TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileDialogCustomPlace extends System.Object

summary.span: Representa uma entrada em uma coleção de local personalizado para Windows Vista.

span.span: Represents an entry in a custom place collection for Windows Vista.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O padrão abrir e salvar caixas de diálogo em [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] tem uma área no lado esquerdo da caixa de diálogo intitulada **Links Favoritos**.The default open and save dialog boxes on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] have an area on the left side of the dialog box titled **Favorite Links**. Essa área é denominada locais personalizados.This area is called custom places. Essa classe representa um local personalizado.This class represents a custom place. Em [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], essa classe não tem nenhum efeito.On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect.

summary.span: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Guid knownFolderGuid) cil managed

param.name: knownFolderGuid
param.span: Um que representa uma Pasta Conhecida [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].

span.span: A that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.

summary.span: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe com o local personalizado identificado por um GUID de Pasta Conhecida [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a custom place identified by a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obter uma lista dos [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] pastas conhecidas, consulte [GUIDs de pasta conhecidas para locais do arquivo de caixa de diálogo personalizada](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) ou o arquivo KnownFolders.h a [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)].For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o método.The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. Para executar este exemplo, cole o seguinte código em um formulário do Windows e a chamada `InitializeDialogAndButton` do construtor do formulário ou método manipulador de eventos.To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: com um caminho de pasta especificada para um local personalizado.

span.span: with a specified folder path to a custom place.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid KnownFolderGuid { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };

summary.span: Obtém ou define o GUID de Pasta Conhecida [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] para o local personalizado.

span.span: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID for the custom place.

value.span: Um que indica o [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] pasta conhecida para o local personalizado.

span.span: A that indicates the [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder for the custom place.

value.span: Se o local personalizado foi especificado um caminho de pasta, um GUID vazio será retornado.

span.span: If the custom place was specified with a folder path, then an empty GUID is returned.

value.span: Para obter uma lista dos [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] pastas conhecidas, consulte [GUIDs de pasta conhecidas para locais do arquivo de caixa de diálogo personalizada](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) ou o arquivo KnownFolders.h a [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)].

span.span: For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Obtém ou define um caminho de pasta para o local personalizado.

span.span: Gets or sets the folder path to the custom place.

value.span: Um caminho de pasta para o local personalizado.

span.span: A folder path to the custom place.

value.span: Se o local personalizado foi especificado com um [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] conhecido GUID de pasta, em seguida, uma cadeia de caracteres vazia é retornada.

span.span: If the custom place was specified with a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID, then an empty string is returned.
